name: Wings Of The Sovereign
description:
Story:

"The Caretaker's Tree... They say if you kneel before it and pray. A Sovereign will hear your cry and aid you... But at a price."

A 3 Boss Rush JRPG in which a group work together to save the life of someone they hold dear. I hope you enjoy.

PS Controller doesn't work.

Maker's Note:

I spent 4 months on this game. I made the code from the ground up and worked in Unity.

I learned a lot and I'm glad I made it. It isn't my best work but I can say that I made a game. I'm gonna just continue on other games. This one I feel is finished (at least I met all my personal goals for it).

Thank you Momerz Artz for the Boss Portraits:
